entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of freezing rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
